channel.title: The Pod Of Alan
channel.description: Riffing on working in public, making stuff, creativity, art, design, education, learning, language, mental health, movies, music, and more.
channel.itunes:summary: Riffing on working in public, making stuff, creativity, art, design, education, learning, language, mental health, movies, music, and more.
channel.itunes:author: Alan W. Smith
channel.itunes:keywords: mental health, art, design, creative process, creativity, learning in public, working in public

item.title: S1:E4 - Aftershow
item.description:
Topics Include:

  • Pushing to make a podcast as part of the practice
  • Hosting the podcast myself to maintain control
  • Dead page for Cory Doctorow's My Blog, My Outboard Brain
  • Live page for Cory Doctorow's My Blog, My Outboard Brain

Around The Web:

You can also find me on my site, Twitter, and Twitch
item.author: Alan W. Smith

item.title: S1:E4 - Practice In Isolation
item.description:
Topics Include:

  • Perfect is the enemy of done
  • I only read the synopsis and haven't listened to it yet, but this is the Gary Vee podcast episode Why You Need to STOP Judging Your Content so Much
  • Putting in the practice
  • On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft by Stephen King
  • Shitty First Drafts from Anne Lamott
  • Silver Bullets of success ain't a thing
  • The Adventure Zone Podcast
  • Missing a Bama game for the first time in twenty years
  • Adapting to stability
  • The subtle slide of isolation degrading mental health

Around The Web:

You can also find me on my site, Twitter, and Twitch

item.title: S1:E3 - Aftershow
item.description:
Short aftershow on this one.

Topics Include:

  • General Content/Trigger Warning - occasionally, there will be talk of suicide and suicidal ideation
  • Repetition is a thing
  • Meta-Repetition is a thing
  • The Ryan Reynolds Will Ferrell TikTok

Around The Web:

item.title: S1:E3 - My Three Brains
item.description:
Topics Include:

  • Having a Tweet go viral
  • The tweet itself: I'm "still afraid to use spaces in file names" years old
  • I try to explain the joke to non-technical folks... Not sure I did a great job of that
  • The three different versions of me (and my brain)
  • The mental capacity and energy required for learning
  • A little history of my bipolar experience over the past few years
  • Removing "just" from our teaching
  • Doing something that fails vs being a failure
  • Exits without edits

Around The Web:

You can also find me on my site, Twitter, and Twitch

item.itunes:author: Alan W. Smith
item.itunes:summary: Riding a viral tweet and the three brains of mania, depression, and stability.
item.itunes:subtitle: Riding a viral tweet and the three brains of mania, depression, and stability.
item.itunes:keywords: learning, bipolar disorder, teaching, viral, mania, mental capacity, depression

item.title: S1:E2 - Changing The Intro
item.description:
Topics Include:

  • The history of the intro and changing it up
  • Working in public
  • A brief mention of Digital Gardens
  • The Workshop and The Woodshed
  • Cleaning the blog
  • Considering an audio bumper intro (which retroactively ended up being music queues)
  • Considering a podcast episode that's only sign language
  • We're gonna get into some tech, but this ain't no tech show
  • The possibility of popularity
  • Ejecting

Post show idea:

  • See if there's software that would could use to make sign language versions of the podcast. At first blush id doesn't look like this has been solved though there is this dataset to look at.

Around The Web:

You can also find me on my site, Twitter, and Twitch

item.title: S1:E1 - Aftershow
item.description:
Welcome to the show after the show!

After I finished an episode I usually leave the mic on and keep going for a while. A kind of reset and review and wind down and maybe some context. This is the first one of those. Offered for your entertainment.

Today's Topics Include:

  • Loose guidelines
  • Playing vs Trying and changing the language in our heads
  • Doing something like trash does not mean we are trash
  • etc... vs "blah, blah, blah"
  • We'll touch on mental health and bipolar disorder
  • On the therapeutic value of talking to the camera

Ideas:

  • Write an app that gauges my speech to see if it can detect signs of depression

Around The Web:

You can also find me on my site, Twitter, and Twitch
item.author: Alan W. Smith

After I finished an episode I usually leave the mic on and keep going for a while. A kind of reset and review and wind down and maybe some context. This is the first one of those. Offered for your entertainment.

item.itunes:keywords: bipolar disorder, rubber ducking, mental health, playing, language

item.title: S1:E1 - Obligatory Intro Meta Talk
item.description:
Hello, hello! I'm Alan and this is the kick off episode of my podcast... kinda. I've actually been recording for years, but never posted anything. Those episodes will make an appearance eventually, but for now, we're starting fresh.

Today's Topics Include:

  • Intros and getting started
  • Movie trailers as appetizers
  • Alex Trost's Frontend.horse
  • Using Noise in Generative Art
  • George Francis - The Digital Generative Artist
  • Talking about meta talk
  • Artist and audience
  • Aftershow promo

You can also find me on my site, Twitter, and Twitch
item.author: Alan W. Smith
item.content:encoded:
